page.title: 10DOG BREEDERS, HAYDON BRIDGE
page.content: Mrs.Hawley of Heugh Lane Cottage is a Judge of Belgian Dogs and a breeder of champion{Belgian Shepherd dogs.}There are 3 types of Belgian shepherd: the Groenendael which is long-haired & black; the Malinois, short-haired & red; and the Tevuren, long-coated & either red or grey in colour. All are great characters. These dogs were originally bred to guard sheep rather than herd them, During the '39-'45 War many were killed carrying messages sent by the Underground Belgian people who actively opposed the Germans. For this reason and wartime shortage of food for dogs, the breed was small in no.in 1945. This necessitated fierce in-breeding and some dogs still become too nervous and fierce. The cost of a show specimen is about Â£150
